name: Unstable Business (Oleksii Shvernenko)
description:
Short Information

Unstable Business is a game where you need to use your logic a bit.

The key mechanic is building figures on each other and making it stable for fixed amount of time for it to freeze. 
You have to use all the figures you've got to succeed the level. 
Figures have different shapes while levels have different conditions to build.

This project was created as my first Test Task and can be recreated with using of local raycasts to detect the ground and remove 90% of bool and if/else statements.
